alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 01 at 9:11PM CST until January 01 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 5 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 PARISH IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA MADISON IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, BRANDON, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, DE KALB, DECATUR, DURANT, EUPORA, FOREST, GOODMAN, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MATHISTON, MERIDIAN, MORTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, SCOOBA, STARKVILLE, TALLULAH, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WEIR, WEST POINT, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
